description: A collection of circles in a tall rectangular formation with rounded corners and a small crescent-shaped formation to its right; the two formations are connected by a thin rectangular formation of circles and there is a small trapezoidal formation of circles above the thin rectangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a thin black triangle on the left side of the tall rectangular formation and a light blue triangle in the center of the thin rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
